response.job_title: Co-founder & CTO of ILUMA AI | Techstars '23 | 2x Founder
response.summary:
Daniel is the Co-founder & CTO of ILUMA.

ILUMA is the AI copilot for C-level and team leads. ILUMA AI is your eyes and ears across your company’s platform stack, identifying problems before they occur in your team and across their work. It prevents and solves bottlenecks, realigns company vision, retains top talent and helps you make the right decisions at the right time.

Daniel has extensive experience and expertise in the areas of AI, NLP, IP Telephony, SaaS Platforms, Marketplaces, CRMs, APIs, and complex integrations. 

Daniel was recognized as a Top Latam Tech Leader ($10B in exits).
response.skills: Technical Leadership, Project Management, Software Development, Software Design, PHP, Algorithm Design, Laravel, Android Development, C++, Unity3D, Java, MySQL, JavaScript, Amazon Web Services, HTML5, C#, Software Testing Life Cycle, PostgreSQL, Servicios web de RESTful, Redis

profile_positions.description: ILUMA is the AI copilot for C-level & team leads that acts as your eyes and ears inside your company - identifying problems before they occur and helping you make the right decision every time.

profile_positions.description: VOIQ has raised $5 million from YCombinator and other top Silicon Valley investors to bring the power of AI Conversational Voice to every business website, web app, and mobile app on the planet.
